channel.title: Light-To-Dark v2 coming out on - 7/16/2011
channel.description:
[font=arial][size=24pt]Light-To-Dark[/size][/font]
Colors - [color=green]Green - complete [color=yellow]Yellow - started [color=Red]Red - Not started
Perfect Ring Coded! That's Right!!!
custom quest added
full crafting interface
website made
smithing 100%
altar added to home
Christmas cracker working
cooking 100%
fishing 100%
hunter started
construction started
::kdr added
Duel arena added
Added custom boss to quest which drops the divine sigil!
Complete new starter system as suggested by players
My 562 is better than emily's
Home moved to edgeville
Altar heals your prayer
Started on skilling shop
Ladder at home works
Added forceChat system for quest, starter, and itemonitem interface
Thanked people for suggesting what they wanted to suggest! :)
Thieving 100%
Bork added and more
More coming soon just wanted to update you guys on what I have just did, I just made it where if you have a hammer in your inventory a sigil and a blessed spirit shield, you make a spirit shield based on the sigil and you get 50k smithing experience.
I would like someone to leave any suggestions they would like me to add before the release next Saturday :). Noone helps me code so I guess i'm gonna have to work on this alone again :o
[img]http://i1229.photobucket.com/albums/ee464/austin1234able/slayer-scape.png[/img] [img]http://i1229.photobucket.com/albums/ee464/austin1234able/workingloots.png[/img] [img]http://i1229.photobucket.com/albums/ee464/austin1234able/pvp.png[/img] [img]http://i1229.photobucket.com/albums/ee464/austin1234able/workingags.png[/img] [img]http://i1229.photobucket.com/albums/ee464/austin1234able/workingzgs.png[/img] [img]http://i1229.photobucket.com/albums/ee464/austin1234able/workingdivineeffect.png[/img] [img]http://i1229.photobucket.com/albums/ee464/austin1234able/dbowrush.png[/img]
Ok so guys I know a lot of you may have heard of the server slayer-scape that I have been working on. Well on and off since December. I have released many versions and my friend decided to stop hosting so I am releasing V1 of Light-To-Dark 562 Basically the features of Light-To-Dark are: Working pvp combat, also on a regular 562 source and client not atomicscape base nor is it demoniaxscape base. Working ep system. Nice ep drops, target drops, and rare drops. Keep items on death. Divine effect working, all special attacks working. Nice starter. Cool shop with great items to purchase, statuette drops, sell to shops for some cash ranging from 100k-10m. Fixed blackscreen glitch at login, you will no longer get a blackscreen by logging out then back-in. Cool login gfx and animation you leep into the air at login, cool login message forcechat. Made dragon bones give 100k xp each. Train prayer by killing green dragons at ::easts. Jail is above the grand exchange, added a ~kbdwar command which is basically a place where you can spawn npc's at. Adding new bosses new area's places and npc's in v2 also dh hit's like a 634 when using smash. Improved vesta's longsword by making it hit less 0's. Added correct vesta's spear animation. Banner coming soon. And I will add much more to this page but right now I am very sleepy and on my iPod. So enjoy these pictures:

item.title: Light-To-Dark v2 coming out on - 7/16/2011
item.dc:creator: @Icefanhero Icefanhero
item.description:
@Icefanhero wrote:

You might be earning respect by doing stuff like this

Very few people don’t ask for rep and the people that do most likely are leechers this is original the stuff that you do

This is the first 562 pk server I have ever seen that has not been atomicscape base or demoniaxscape base

I like how you keep items at death and you can do commands in any chosen display mode and when switching resolutions the client does not mess up

I rate your work 10/10 never stop what you do Austin.

You’ll be famous one day

Read full topic

Ok so guys I know a lot of you may have heard of the server slayer-scape that I have been working on.
Well on and off since December.
I have released many versions and my friend decided to stop hosting so I am releasing
V1 of Light-To-Dark 562
Basically the features of Light-To-Dark are:
Working pvp combat, also on a regular 562 source and client not atomicscape base nor is it demoniaxscape base.
Working ep system.
Nice ep drops, target drops, and rare drops.
Keep items on death.
Divine effect working, all special attacks working.
Nice starter.
Cool shop with great items to purchase, statuette drops, sell to shops for some cash ranging from 100k-10m.
Fixed blackscreen glitch at login, you will no longer get a blackscreen by logging out then back-in.
Cool login gfx and animation you leep into the air at login, cool login message forcechat.
Made dragon bones give 100k xp each. Train prayer by killing green dragons at ::easts.
Jail is above the grand exchange, added a ~kbdwar command which is basically a place where you can spawn npc’s at.
Adding new bosses new area’s places and npc’s in v2 also dh hit’s like a 634 when using smash.
Improved vesta’s longsword by making it hit less 0’s.
Added correct vesta’s spear animation. Banner coming soon.
And I will add much more to this page but right now I am very sleepy and on my iPod.
So enjoy these pictures:
